title: Ticket #6533: ResultsDir to specify where to put output files
description: It would be nice to be able to specify a directory to put results (output files) into. Right now I can use InitialDir but that requires me to modify other paths in my submit file, and has its own issues (e.g. #6530).
remarks:
2019-Apr-23 11:18:04 by johnkn:
There is a submit keyword output_destination which currently only works when set to be a URL. We should make this work when the output destination is a normal folder as well.
creator: matyas
